/** * An instance of this class has ranges captured in matching. * * @xerces.internal * * @see RegularExpression#matches(char[], int, int, Match) * @see RegularExpression#matches(char[], Match) * @see RegularExpression#matches(java.text.CharacterIterator, Match) * @see RegularExpression#matches(java.lang.String, int, int, Match) * @see RegularExpression#matches(java.lang.String, Match) * @author TAMURA Kent <kent@trl.ibm.co.jp> * @version $Id: Match.java,v 1.6 2004/10/04 22:07:40 mrglavas Exp $ */
